actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Governmental Efficiency.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from Government of the District of Columbia; Labor Department.
Committee on Governmental Affairs received executive comment from Government of the District of Columbia.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Governmental Efficiency and the District of Columbia

official_title: A bill to convey the District of Columbia Employment Security Building to the District of Columbia and to provide for the payment of a note entered into to finance the construction of such building.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Labor to convey the District of Columbia Employment Security Building to the District of Columbia. Declares that the United States shall remain liable for payments on the note financing construction of such building, but requires the District of Columbia to reimburse the Government for such payments.

titles.title: A bill to convey the District of Columbia Employment Security Building to the District of Columbia and to provide for the payment of a note entered into to finance the construction of such building.
